trans-unit.source: Azure MFA Signin experience with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Azure MFA Signin experience with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page will provide you guidance on where to go to see the various signin methods available with Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will provide you guidance on where to go to see the various signin methods available with Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: The sign in experience with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: The sign in experience with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: The following information is provided to help guide you through the sign in experience.
trans-unit.target: The following information is provided to help guide you through the sign in experience.

trans-unit.source: What will your sign in experience be?
trans-unit.target: What will your sign in experience be?

trans-unit.source: Depending on how you sign in and use multi-factor authentication, your experience will differ.
trans-unit.target: Depending on how you sign in and use multi-factor authentication, your experience will differ.

trans-unit.source: In this section we will provide information on what to expect when you sign in.
trans-unit.target: In this section we will provide information on what to expect when you sign in.

trans-unit.source: Choose the one that best describes what you are doing:
trans-unit.target: Choose the one that best describes what you are doing:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Signing in with mobile or office phone</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Signing in with mobile or office phone</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This is what you can expect from signing in using your mobile or office phone.
trans-unit.target: This is what you can expect from signing in using your mobile or office phone.

trans-unit.source: This is what you can expect from signing in the mobile app with notifications.
trans-unit.target: This is what you can expect from signing in the mobile app with notifications.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Signing in with the mobile app using verification code</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Signing in with the mobile app using verification code</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This is what you can expect from signing in the mobile app with a verification code.
trans-unit.target: This is what you can expect from signing in the mobile app with a verification code.

trans-unit.source: This will show you what to expect if you want to use an alternate method.
trans-unit.target: This will show you what to expect if you want to use an alternate method.
